Articles.Content:
So I am furiously frustrated by the lack of fascinating command pods and so have begun the adventure of modeling them myself.

I am a complete beginner at Blender ( it took me 1 hour to get through 12 minutes of a tutorial video ).

The Zackomax MPMCM is intended to be a modular part system. I don't have too much yet but don't give up on me!

4 kerbal command pod. Each kerbal sits across from each other, with each brave victim having a complete view with 3 windows.

Edited June 12, 2014 by SessoSaidSo
Shouldn't this be in the development forum, not the release forum?
Yeah wrong forum buddy, but good luck none the less!

So by modular, what do you mean? Do you plan on creating internal nodes and specific parts (containers, tanks, etc.) that go in them?

Either way, looking good on blender especially for a first timer. Keep it up!
